properties.displayName: Fax Service DLL Search Order Hijack
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "ualapi.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\fxssvc.exe") and (not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: The Fax service attempts to load ualapi.dll, which is non-existent. An attacker can then (side)load their own malicious DLL using this service.
